GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Those legendary clothes are supposed
to be in a <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff> somewhere along the
<clr:0000>coastline<clr:ffff> here.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Problem is, there's a lot of coastline,
and no way to narrow things down!

<sp:3:0:2:0501>I've heard that if you walk with your eyes
up, you'll find it right away...

But it's supposed to be in a cave, I think.
Caves are usually close to the ground,
right?<sp:5:0:0> Where is this treasure?!
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I've tracked a piece of Misko's <clr:0000>legendary
wardrobe<clr:ffff> to a <clr:0000>cave on the north bank<clr:ffff> of
the nearby Floria River!
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Which would be great...<sp:5:0:0>if the river hadn't
<clr:0000>flooded the cave<clr:ffff> and I weren't wearing
designer clothes. What do I do now?
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I got a hot tip that the treasure is hidden
in a cave along the coastline.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Yep. Somewhere along this...very, very
long coastline.<sp:0:4:0>I have heard it's easier to find the cave
if you "walk with your eyes up."<sp:0:4:0>Though honestly, that doesn't make much
sense to me...
FriendGreet_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>Ack, it's the Yiga Clan! Wait.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Notice>That mask... That's one I made!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>Hey, I know you—you're the guy who
saved me.<sp:5:0:0> You gave me a real jump there!
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive>You know how you can follow this road
to the sea?<sp:5:0:0> <clr:0000>One of Misko's treasures<clr:ffff> is
hidden in <clr:0000>a cave along the shore<clr:ffff>.
Sounds like a pretty great tip, right? It is,
until you remember how big the sea is...
That's a lot of ground to cover.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Apparently the key to finding it is to
"walk with your eyes up"...<sp:5:0:0>but it just
feels weird to look up for a cave.
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The treasure's supposed to be in a <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff>
on the <clr:0000>northern bank of the Floria River<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0>
but the cave's completely flooded.
*sigh*<sp:5:0:0> The sooner I get my hands on
<clr:0000>Misko's legendary clothes<clr:ffff>, the sooner
I can return to my lovely Nobo...
FriendGreet_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm glad to see you keeping well, at least!
You're clearly having fun on your journey.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>Me, I'm still spending all my time seeking
out <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>, so that I might
return to my beloved Nobo.
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Maybe it's <clr:0000>northwest<clr:ffff> of here. I mean,
there is a <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff> on the northern bank
of the <clr:0000>Floria River<clr:ffff>, so...
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Yeah, I'm calling it now! Misko's treasure
is absolutely, positively in that cave!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Along with a whooole lot of <clr:0000>river water<clr:ffff>.
That's gonna be a problem.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0501>I mean, I'm dressed in Cece brand from
head to toe.<sp:5:0:0> I'm not about to get any of
this stuff wet.
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>I know Misko's treasure is hidden near
<clr:0000>Floria River <clr:ffff>to the <clr:0000>northwest<clr:ffff>. It's in a
cave on the river's north bank!<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>But just knowing that doesn't actually
help me. The <clr:0000>cave <clr:ffff>is filled with <clr:0000>river
water<clr:ffff>, and I can't get in.
Yiga_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Also, it might not be my place to say...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0400>But maybe find a different look. <sp:5:1:0>Otherwise
everyone will think you're part of the
Yiga Clan.
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The legendary clothes are in a cave on
the <clr:0000>northern bank of the Floria River<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0>But the cave is <clr:0000>flooded<clr:ffff> and getting in
would ruin my outfit... <sp:5:1:0>I'm sorry, Nobo,
but our love will have to wait.
RestPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff> should be in a cave
somewhere around here...<sp:5:0:0>but I've been
looking for so long, I'm just spent.
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I know it's hidden inside a <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff>
somewhere <clr:0000>along the shore<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0>But there's a whole lot of shore and only
one me.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>I heard that you need to "walk with your
eyes up," but I'm not about to risk my
Cece-designed hat falling off.
Near_GoRange_02: I'll find this one for sure!
RestPoint_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I won't give up though! I can't confess
my love to Nobo without those clothes!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>I see it all in my mind's eye—Nobo, as beautiful as
ever. Me, clad in legendary fashion! Aaah! There's
no way she wouldn't fall in love with me too!
There is, of course, the worry that Nobo might
attract other suitors while I'm out searching...<sp:0:4:0>Once I've rested up, I need to find those clothes.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive_01>The <clr:0000>treasure's supposed to be in a cave<clr:ffff>
on the north bank of the Floria River...<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>But the cave's flooded, so I can't get in.
RainPoint_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I won't give up though! I can't confess
my love to Nobo without those clothes!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>I see it all in my mind's eye— Nobo, as beautiful as 
ever. Me, clad in legendary fashion! Aaah! There's
no way she wouldn't fall in love with me too!
There is, of course, the worry that Nobo might
attract other suitors while I'm out searching...<sp:0:4:0>Once the rain stops, I need to find those clothes.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
RestPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Some of Misko's <clr:0000>legendary clothing<clr:ffff>
should be in a <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff> in this region...<sp:0:4:0>I just can't find it.
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm not even close to finding <clr:0000>Misko's
legendary clothes<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>They're supposed to
be in a <clr:0000>cave by the seashore<clr:ffff>...
But so far, no dice. I've heard you've got
to "walk with your eyes up," but I don't
want my Cece hat to fall off.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>The cave containing Misko's treasure is
supposed to be <clr:0000>somewhere along this
very, very long coastline<clr:ffff>.
I was told to keep my eyes up, but looking
up for a cave just feels wrong.<sp:5:0:0> Misko
really hid that "hidden treasure," huh?
FriendGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>Oh! <sp:5:0:0>We met earlier, right?<sp:5:1:0> Remember me?<sp:0:4:0>Of course you do, nobody could forget
style this sublime.<sp:5:0:0> You saved me from
the Yiga Clan!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Gotta say, <sp:5:1:0>being forced to make their
costumes was really miserable.

Who knows what might've happened to
my fashion sense if you hadn't shown up?
Yiga:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Also, seeing it again...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>I make a fine mask! Any Yiga would be
lucky to end up with gear that elegant.<sp:5:1:0>
I really am a fashion genius.
FriendGreet_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm hot on the trail of Misko's hidden
treasure. First I get the treasure, then I
confess my feelings to my beloved Nobo!
And when I say <clr:0000>treasure<clr:ffff>, I mean <clr:0000>clothes<clr:ffff>!
The bandit Misko hid part of their
legendary wardrobe in a nearby <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Just imagine it! Me, dressed entirely in
Cece, offering Nobo my love with one
hand and Misko's clothes with the other!
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>Old fashion meets new!<sp:5:0:0> Romance meets
adventure! A moving scene that speaks to
love in our modern era!<sp:5:1:0> That's my plan.
